snippet: Even with the storm, confidence rises and the jobs numbers improve. Does your start-up need a public-relations firm? Is the iPhone financially irresponsible? And what will you do differently before the next storm?
abstract: Even with the storm, confidence rises and the jobs numbers improve. Does your start-up need a public-relations firm? Is the iPhone financially irresponsible? And what will you do differently before the next storm?

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Good News for the Next President
